title: Personal Portfolio Website
description: A personal portfolio website built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

title: CycleScope: Visualizing Cyclist Traffic Flows
description: Explore Boston and Cambridge’s bike network with real-time station data, dynamic traffic flows, and time-based filtering—revealing when and where cyclists are on the move, implemented with D3.js

title: Visualizing MacroNutrients on Glucose Spikes
description: Our project team addressed the issue of diabetic awareness, aimed at educating which factors contribute to diabetes. Scroll along as we demonstrate surprising findings from the CGMacros Dataset, a 10-day collection of health data from over 40 participants.

title: Weather App
description: A weather forecast app built using an API and React.js.

title: E-commerce Backend
description: A backend system for an e-commerce app using Node.js and Express.

title: Blog Website
description: A blog website built using Django and PostgreSQL.

title: Mobile Game
description: A 2D mobile game built using Unity and C#.

title: Chat Application
description: A real-time chat application using WebSocket and Node.js.

title: Finance Dashboard
description: A dashboard to track financial metrics built using Python and Flask.

title: Fitness Tracker
description: A mobile fitness tracker built using Flutter and Firebase.

title: Social Media Website
description: A social media website built using MERN stack.

title: Placeholder Project
description: This is placeholder data for a future project.
